feature: TypeScript project builds without syntax errors
Pylint runs against Python services only
Documentation markdown files include YAML front matter
command:
python - <<'PY' | tee evidence/docs-front-matter-<timestamp>.txt
from pathlib import Path
root = Path('docs')
paths = sorted(root.glob('*.md'))
for path in paths:
    text = path.read_text().splitlines()
    status = False
    if len(text) >= 4 and text[0] == '---' and text[3] == '---':
        front_matter = '
'.join(text[1:3])
        if 'layout:' in front_matter and 'title:' in front_matter:
            status = True
    print(f"{path}: {'OK' if status else 'MISSING'}")
PY
